key.name: whitelisted-plugins
key.summary: List of plugins that are allowed to be loaded
key.description: A list of strings representing the plugins that are allowed to be loaded (default: 'all'). The plugins still need to be marked as active to get loaded. This is only evaluated on startup.

key.name: active
key.summary: Activation of this plugin
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue
